verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Gittith <S%H1665><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our Lord <S%H113><s%>, how excellent <S%H117><s%> is thy name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>! who hast set <S%H5414><s%> thy glory <S%H1935><s%> above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

Out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of babes <S%H5768><s%> and sucklings <S%H3243><s%> hast thou ordained <S%H3245><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> because of thine enemies <S%H6887><s%>, that thou mightest still <S%H7673><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger <S%H5358><s%>. ordained: Heb. founded

When I consider <S%H7200><s%> thy heavens <S%H8064><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy fingers <S%H676><s%>, the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%>, which thou hast ordained <S%H3559><s%>;
What is man <S%H582><s%>, that thou art mindful <S%H2142><s%> of him? and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, that thou visitest <S%H6485><s%> him?
For thou hast made him a little <S%H4592><s%> lower <S%H2637><s%> than the angels <S%H430><s%>, and hast crowned <S%H5849><s%> him with glory <S%H3519><s%> and honour <S%H1926><s%>.
Thou madest him to have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over the works <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>; thou hast put <S%H7896><s%> all things under his feet <S%H7272><s%>:
All sheep <S%H6792><s%> and oxen <S%H504><s%>, yea, and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; All: Heb. Flocks and oxen all of them
The fowl <S%H6833><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and whatsoever passeth through <S%H5674><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>.
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our Lord <S%H113><s%>, how excellent <S%H117><s%> is thy name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>!
